title: New: Wih'lo – Unbreak
body:
Hours into 2013 and eighteen year old producer **Wih’lo** has already signalled his intentions for the rest of the year.

New cut _Unbreak_ is an organic, slow burning electronic number, utilizing his euphoria inducing expertise with vocal samples, wielding a maturity far beyond his modest years. With the likes of **XXYYXX** and **Disclosure** exploding in 2012, it’s likely that the next twelve months will witness the rise of like-minded young producers, and mark my words, Wih’lo is going to be right up at the top.
